#summary Lingwah Features

= Features =

  * Grammar definition directly in Java 
  * Full expressive power of Context Free Grammars
  * Excellent parse error reporting
  * Parsing API that creates AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) from a grammar definition and some text.  
  * AST Navigation API for selecting nodes from an AST. 
  * AST Visitor API for processing parsed results. 
  * Comes with sample grammar definitions (currently only [http://www.w3.org/TeamSubmission/turtle/ Turtle])
